data.name: web-portfolio
data.description: web portfolio built with next.js and tailwind css.
data.readme:
#  portfolio website

portfolio website built with next.js and tailwind css, featuring smooth animations and a clean design :)

## ğŸ“‹ features

- dark/light mode
- smooth page transitions
- dynamic project showcase
- github integration
- interactive ui elements
- animated components

## ğŸ› ï¸ technologies used

- next.js - react framework
- tailwind css - styling
- framer-motion - animations
- lucide-react - icons
- typescript - type safety
- github api - project data

## ğŸ“¥ installation

ensure you have node.js installed on your system.

clone the repository:

```bash
git clone https://github.com/0sum-git/portfolio
```

install dependencies:

```bash
npm install
```

## ğŸš€ how to run

development mode:

```bash
npm run dev
```

build for production:

```bash
npm run build
```

start production server:

```bash
npm start
```

## ğŸ“ project structure

```
src/
â”œâ”€â”€ app/              # app router pages
â”œâ”€â”€ components/       # react components
â”œâ”€â”€ lib/             # utility functions
â”œâ”€â”€ styles/          # global styles
â””â”€â”€ types/           # typescript types
```

## ğŸ’¾ data management

projects are fetched from github api and stored in a structured format:

```typescript
interface project {
  name: string;
  description: string;
  stars: number;
  language: string;
  topics: string[];
  updated_at: string;
}
```
